title: Categories

title: blog
content: <h3><a href="/blog/personal/2016/03/18/hello-world">Hello World</a></h3><p><small><strong>March 18, 2016</strong> . personal.</small></p>	<h3><a href="/blog/demonstration/2016/03/17/setting-up-jekyll">Slogging like a Slacker.</a></h3><p><small><strong>March 17, 2016</strong> . demonstration.</small></p>	<h3><a href="/blog/demonstration/2016/03/17/markdown-test">Markdown Tests.</a></h3><p><small><strong>March 17, 2016</strong> . demonstration.</small></p>	<h3><a href="/blog/2016/03/17/markdown-as-github-likes-it">Markdown, as Github likes it.</a></h3><p><small><strong>March 17, 2016</strong> . .</small></p>

title: about
content: <h1>About Victor</h1><p>	Hello, my name is Victor Lawrence. I have a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bachelor_of_Fine_Arts" target="_blank">BFA</a> from <a href="https://theatre.columbusstate.edu/" target="_blank">Columbus State University</a> in Theatrical Design and Technology and I like building stuff for the web. 	I'm an Apprentice Software Engineer for a startup whose headquarters is located in <a href="https://goo.gl/maps/PrrVotiqdV42" target="_blank">New Haven, Connecticut</a>. 	I help build new and helpful interfaces for our customers and employees to use.</p><p>	I am passionate about making things feel smooth, quick and intuitive. In other words, I want to build interfaces so good that you don't really notice them.</p><p>	Want to make something together? I'm game. You can find all the best ways to <a href="\contact\">contact me here</a>.</p><h2>About this site</h2><p>This website is rendered serverside using Github Page's excellent Jekyll implementation. The fonts are from Google and the color scheme from here. Icons are from Font-Awesome.</p>

* { box-sizing: border-box; }body { background-color: #001f3f; margin: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: row; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; }header { min-height: 32px; background: #0074d9; color: white; width: 100%; display: flex; text-align: center; justify-content: center; align-items: center; position: relative; z-index: 2; }header a { color: white; text-decoration: none; }footer { min-height: 200px; background: #0074d9; color: #ffffff; display: flex; margin: 0; padding: 0; width: 100%; padding: 1em; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }footer a { color: #FFDC00; }main { flex-grow: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; overflow: auto; height: 100vh; }main .secret-menu { display: none; position: fixed; color: #FFDC00; padding: .6em; height: 36px; width: 36px; justify-content: center; align-items: center; background: #85144b; top: 36px; right: 36px; z-index: 1; font-size: 3em; border-radius: 3em; }main .secret-menu a { color: #FFDC00; }main article { flex-grow: 1; }main article, main section { max-width: 720px; padding: 0 1em; width: 100%; background-color: #ffffff; color: #001f3f; }main article ul, main article pre, main section ul, main section pre { overflow: auto; }main article ul, main article ol, main section ul, main section ol { margin: 0; }main article hr, main section hr { border: none; border-top: 1px solid; }main article kbd, main article pre, main article code, main section kbd, main section pre, main section code { padding: .25em .25em; border-radius: .5em; background: #111111; color: #ffffff; }main article table, main section table { border: 1px solid; overflow: auto; }main article table th, main section table th { background: #85144b; color: #ffffff; font-weight: normal; padding: .25em; }main article table td, main section table td { border: 1px solid #001f3f; }main article strong, main section strong { font-weight: bold; }main article pre, main section pre { background: #111111; color: #ffffff; }main article p, main section p { margin: .5em 0; }main article h1, main article h2, main article h3, main article h4, main article h5, main article h6, main section h1, main section h2, main section h3, main section h4, main section h5, main section h6 { font-family: "Vesper Libre", cursive; margin-bottom: .125em; margin-top: .75em; line-height: 1em; color: #85144b; }main article h1, main section h1 { font-size: 3em; }main article h2, main section h2 { font-size: 2em; }main article h3, main section h3 { font-size: 1.5em; }main article h4, main section h4 { font-size: 1.25em; }main article h5, main section h5 { font-size: 1em; }main article h6, main section h6 { font-size: .75em; }main article a, main section a { color: #F012BE; font-style: italic; }main section.default { flex-grow: 1; width: 100%; }main section:not(:empty) { padding-bottom: 1em; }body > nav { background: #85144b; width: 96px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; flex-shrink: 0; align-items: center; position: relative; z-index: 2; }body > nav a { min-height: 96px; width: 100%; text-decoration: none; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; color: #ffffff; }body > nav a .fa { font-size: 2em; text-decoration: none; }body > nav a:hover { background: #001f3f; color: #FFDC00; }body > nav a.active { background-color: #FFDC00; color: #001f3f; }body > nav a.active:hover { background: #0074d9; color: #ffffff; }header.in-body { display: none; }@media only screen and (max-width: 840px) { body { flex-wrap: wrap; }  header.in-body { display: flex; }  main { height: auto; min-height: 100vh; max-width: 100%; overflow: unset; }  main .secret-menu { display: flex; }  header.in-main { display: none; } }@media only screen and (max-width: 840px) { body > nav { width: 100%; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-around; } }@media only screen and (max-width: 736px) { main { max-width: 100%; } }

[{% for page in site.pages %}	{		"title"		: "{{ page.title }}",		"url"		: "{{ page.url }}",		"date"		: "{{ page.date | date: "%B %d, %Y" }}",		"content"	: "{{ page.content | escape | strip_newlines }}"	} {% if forloop.last %}{% else %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}]

[{% for post in site.posts %}	{		"title"		: "{{ post.title }}",		"url"		: "{{ post.url }}",		"date"		: "{{ post.date | date: "%B %d, %Y" }}",		"content"	: {{ post.content | jsonify | strip_newlines }},		"tags"		: {{ post.tags | jsonify }},		"categories": {{ post.categories | jsonify }}	}{% if forloop.last %}{% else %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}]
[{{% for prop in site %}	"{{prop}}":{{ site[prop] | jsonify }}{% if forloop.last %}{% else %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}}]
